contentrichtext.text: '''Qulpa''' was Khan of the [[Blue Horde]] from 1359 till 1360, after having deposed his brother [[Berdi Beg]]. Ruling for just a year, Qulpa was murdered by another brother in 1360. ==See also== * [[List of Khans of the Golden Horde]] {{start box}} {{succession box|title=[[List of Khans of the Golden Horde|Khan of the Golden Horde]]|after=[[Nawruz Beg]]|before=[[Berdi Beg]]|years='''1359â€“1360'''}} {{end box}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Qulpa | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Khan of the Golden Horde | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1360 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} [[Category:1360 deaths]] [[Category:Khans of the Golden Horde]] [[Category:Borjigin| ]] [[Category:14th-century monarchs in Europe]] [[Category:Year of birth unknown]] {{Asia-royal-stub}} {{CAsia-hist-stub}}
